ul.li: Mouse = Rotate Camera, Scroll = Zoom Camera
W,A / Arrows = Move Rod Cast Direction
Space = Cast Rod, the higher the rod when you release the spacebar the farther the lure launches.

description.p: If you see a fish jump out of the water throw a lure after it and you will catch it straight away.

screenshot.caption: Tux preparing to cast his lure!

ul.li: Added a fishing hat that can be worn when caught like a fish.
Added two new fish, one of them being the "pirate fish".
